Description: Notice HS/20220323/GM01 / 312375104 - IN served - You have failed to ensure that the exposure of your employees to water-mix metalworking fluid mist, a substance hazardous to health and an asthmagen, created by the Haas VMC750 CNC milling machine (no. UMC1), is either prevented or, where this is not reasonably practicable, adequately controlled, for example by providing local exhaust ventilation.
